name: Pints, Pitches, and Psych
summary: In these 90-minute events, we'll be coaching all participants on how to improve their golf games. Industry-leading mental conditioning coach Dr. Stephen Gonzalez will be joining us to help you with the mental aspect of your golf game. Come on out, enjoy a pint of our finest ale, and learn how to improve your game!
details: Admission includes one incredible pint of ale, swing coaching by Lead Golf Channel Academy Coach Brian Jacobs and mental conditioning with World Known Sports Psychologist Dr. Stephen Gonzalez. June 22nd's session will focus on wedges, July 13th's session will focus on the driver, and the final session on July 27th will focus on putting.

name: Ladies Academy
summary: At last ladies, we have the program just for you! Learn to play golf the right way from the green back to the tee. Instruction and play in a supportive learning environment with like-minded women!
details:

name: Golf Channel Academy Golf Schools
summary: Bring your friends for a special private golf school at Brian Jacobs Golf! Not only will you get instruction, but you'll get lunch and have the chance to play Ridgemont Country Club with your friends! Don't miss this unique golf instruction opportunity.
details: <dl><dt>1-3 students</dt><dd>Arrange your own group</dd><dt>3 hours of instruction</dt><dd>Warm up at 8:30am</dd><dd>Instruction from 9am to 12pm</dd><dd>TrackMan Analysis included</dd><dt>Lunch (Pub menu only)</dt><dt>18 holes at Ridgemont Country Club</dt><dd>Golf cart included</dd><dd>On course instruction with Golf Channel Lead Instructor Brian Jacobs</dd><dd>On course analysis and coaching with Mental Conditioning Coach Dr. Stephen Gonzalez</dd><dt>Custom club fitting (Additional Cost)</dt><dd>$150 for a complete bag fitting</dd><dd>$95 for irons or driver fitting</dd></dl>

name: Wedge Wonderful
summary: Want to make solid contact on all chip shots, and all pitch shots? Learn how to control your trajectory? Develop control of your carry distance? Learn to predict your roll out distance? Wedge Wonderful is for you!
details:
Realize immediate results from these 90 Minute for $99 per person per session, Group Instruction with PGA Golf Channel Lead Instructor Brian Jacobs. You can attend one, two, or all of these great sessions!

  • Session 1 – What wedge and why?
  • Session 2 – Reach new heights!
  • Session 3 – I love land but I also love sand!

name: No More Slice!
summary: Want to fix your slice? This is the group series for you! Eliminate your slice, guaranteed! Learn why you slice and the correction. Learn how to control your golf ball and keep control. Hit more fairways and have more fun!
details:
Realize immediate results from these 90 Minute for $99 per person per session, Group Instruction with PGA Golf Channel Lead Instructor Brian Jacobs. You can attend one, two, or all of these great sessions!

  • Session 1 – The "OH NO" zone (the science behind the slice and the slicers mind)
  • Session 2 – From fantasy to fix!
  • Session 3 – Practice like you play! Games for best practice!

name: PGA Junior Golf Camps
summary:
With the unofficial start the golf season upon us, now is the time to register for a PGA Junior Golf Camp at Ridgemont Country Club, under the supervision of PGA Professional Brian Jacobs.

The comprehensive curriculum, developed by the PGA of America, teaches the fundamentals, including full swing, short game, rules and etiquette instruction. More importantly, camps emphasize skill development and fun by incorporating both on-course play and off-course games. We help your child fall in love with a game they will enjoy for a lifetime.
details:
• June 25th - 29th
    • Half-day – 9am-Noon, ages 7-13
    • Full-day – 9am-4pm, ages 9-16
  • July 16th - 20th
    • Half-day – 9am-Noon, ages 7-13
    • Full-day – 9am-4pm, ages 9-16
  • August 6th - 10th
    • Half-day – 9am-Noon, ages 7-13
    • Full-day – 9am-4pm, ages 9-16

Be sure to act fast, as space is limited!

name: A Night Out with Michael Breed
summary: Don't miss this one-time event with Brian Jacobs and Michael Breed for a night of fun and golf to benefit the WNYPGA Helping Our Patriots Everywhere (HOPE). Space is limited, so be sure to secure your spot today!

name: Learn & Play Getaway
summary: There's no better way to get away from winter and improve your golf game than a Brian Jacobs Golf Learn-and-Play Getaway. We're planning a trip that will include 4 rounds of golf, accommodations, morning golf instruction before your round, and more! Stay tuned for details.

name: Project 10/10
summary: At Brian Jacobs Golf, our goal is to give golfers the consistency they’ve always wanted. Why not let some of the best instructors in the area help you create a new tradition – lower scores and consistent play. We are offering you a limited time opportunity to not only learn how to play and practice, but also have supervised practice as you go!
details:
Start a New Tradition

Finally! Take a major step with your golf game. Add consistency to your game with Golf Channel Academy at Brian Jacobs Golf.

There are few great traditions in sports like the beginning of major season in golf. It leaves so many viewers with the passion to get back out to the course and play the game. Still, both casual and competitive golfers struggle to find their form when teeing it up after some time away from golf.

At Brian Jacobs Golf, our goal is to give golfers the consistency they’ve always wanted and that includes you. Why not let some of the best instructors in the area help you create a new tradition – lower scores and consistent play.

We are offering you a limited time opportunity to not only learn how to play and practice but also have supervised practice as you go!

Purchase our 10/10 program for only $2,850 and you receive ten 60 minute coaching sessions and ten 30 minute supervised practice sessions.

Decide. Commit. Succeed.

*Balance must be used within 6 months of start date
**Coaching and supervised practice may conjoin or be separated
***Full payment is expected at outset of program

name: Holiday Golf Camps
summary: Just because summer is over doesn’t mean your child’s skill development and enjoyment of the game need to stop! Back by popular demand, Ridgemont Country Club will host PGA Junior Golf Camps tailored specifically to your child’s school schedule and holiday breaks. To accommodate your family’s busy schedule, our holiday camps will utilize a FLEX option, which allows you to choose just the camp dates that work for you. You select and pay only for the days you want your child to attend!
details:
• Session 1 (12/27 - 12/29)
    • 1 Day – $80
    • 2 Days – $140
    • 3 Days – $195
  • Session 2 (01/02 - 01/04)
    • 1 Day – $80
    • 2 Days – $140
    • 3 Days – $195

Be sure to act fast, as space is limited!
